mapper.select: SELECT ID, SUBJECT, BODY, POST_DATE, CATEGORY_ID, SUB_CATEGORY_ID, CREATED_BY, CREATED_DATE, LAST_MODIFIED_BY, LAST_MODIFIED_DATE, VERSION FROM ENTRY E
SELECT ID, SUBJECT, BODY, POST_DATE, CATEGORY_ID, SUB_CATEGORY_ID, CREATED_BY, CREATED_DATE, LAST_MODIFIED_BY, LAST_MODIFIED_DATE, VERSION FROM ENTRY E WHERE E.ID = #{id}
SELECT ID, SUBJECT, BODY, POST_DATE, CATEGORY_ID, SUB_CATEGORY_ID, CREATED_BY, CREATED_DATE, LAST_MODIFIED_BY, LAST_MODIFIED_DATE, VERSION FROM ENTRY E WHERE E.CATEGORY_ID = #{categoryId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ENTRY (SUBJECT, BODY, POST_DATE, CATEGORY_ID, SUB_CATEGORY_ID, CREATED_BY, CREATED_DATE, LAST_MODIFIED_BY, LAST_MODIFIED_DATE) VALUES (#{subject}, #{body}, #{postDate}, #{categoryId}, #{subCategoryId}, #{createdBy}, #{createdDate}, #{lastModifiedBy}, #{lastModifiedDate})
mapper.update: UPDATE ENTRY SET SUBJECT = #{subject}, BODY = #{body}, POST_DATE = #{postDate}, CATEGORY_ID = #{categoryId}, SUB_CATEGORY_ID = #{subCategoryId}, CREATED_BY = #{createdBy}, CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate}, LAST_MODIFIED_BY = #{lastModifiedBy}, LAST_MODIFIED_DATE = #{lastModifiedDate}, VERSION = VERSION + 1 WHERE ID = #{id} AND VERSION = #{version}
